page.title: 10RIDING SCHOOL
page.content: {Summerhouse Farm}is owned by Mr and Mrs Weston. Mr Weston works as an agricultural engineer while his wife, Sheila, runs the farm which is mainly a{riding centre.}The buildings are about 300 years old and 8 people can be accommodated for a riding holiday or course. She is helped by her daughter and 2 girl grooms. 35 horses are used on the fairly flat pasture land near the M5. The horses range in size from a 27 inch high Shetland pony to horses of 17 hands suitable for large adults. The school specialises in all types of riding instuction from beginners to those wishing to take part in Events. Disabled people regularly use the centre. 4 different associations and 100 others use the centre weekly. There is an indoor school and boxes for all the horses. Horses are also bred here.
